techniques.name: Command and Scripting Interpreter
techniques.description: Adversaries may abuse command and script interpreters to execute commands, scripts, or binaries.

techniques.name: Application Layer Protocol
techniques.description: Adversaries may communicate using application layer protocols to avoid detection/network filtering.

techniques.name: Phishing
techniques.description: Adversaries may send phishing messages to gain access to victim systems.

techniques.name: Exploit Public-Facing Application
techniques.description: Adversaries may exploit software vulnerabilities in public-facing applications.

techniques.name: External Remote Services
techniques.description: Adversaries may leverage external-facing remote services to gain access to internal networks.
